post.description: Login to system with passcode after using password
post.summary: Login to system with passcode after using password

post.description:
When you get response's `next_step` with value `NextMfa`, you need to call the API
`/login-with-passcode` to complete the login process.
Login user for dev mode. `user_id` params is required.

get.description: Gets session info of the current user
get.summary: Gets session info of the current user

post.description:
Refreshes the current user session. Refresh token is required via either
`Authorization` header or `refresh_token` cookie.
